column4: hi all! how can I find what packages are libGLU and libGLCore in? I have a mess with open/proprietary drivers :-(
so it's there, htop is nice for it's sorting function, look what's eating up there
hmm that sounds different from my another machine which has different things there :-\
you mean that some kernel-level task is eating memory?
do you use shared memory for graphics or a ramdisk ?
I guess not.. gfx memory shows 124 MB. How can I figure out if there is a ramdisk?
htop says nothing about where my memory has gone :-( just 328/1304MB in Mem row
and you say there are ~2.6 g installed, whille free reports just the half ? checking syslog or even memtest for faulty / unmatching stripes (timings?)
the most intersting part is that dmesg says: [    0.000000] Memory: 2665604k/2813312k available. So it seems that kernel does really find it but does not make it available for userspace
and the amounts in meminfo ? maybe paste it
